CustomField.formula: IF(AND( Acquisition_Type__c = "Reacquisition", Client_Invoicing_Type__c = "Transfer"), 0, /* Client Invoicing Type is Transfer only for SOs that have already been assigned, CFDs for these SOs might not apply for downsizing, so we don't want to bill the client for any part of the transfer if it's in Reacq */ IF( ISPICKVAL(Contract_Fee_Detail__r.Fee_Unit__c, "per W"), Contract_Fee_Detail__r.Fee__c * ( Approved_Change_in_Subscription__c * 1000), null))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Multiplies CFD Fee by the Approved Change in Subscription, but unused if this is a downsizing Subscription Order created post-assignment, with a CFD that doesn't allow for downsizing. Also set to 0 for Reacq SOs with Client Invoicing Type of Transfer
CustomField.label: Potential Client Invoicing Fee
